column3: My first reaction:  this violates the KISS principle.\nMy second reaction:  if the consensus is that more complicated logging is needed, then why not use boost::log?\n

I forgot to write my motivation for the patch. I wrote it because I got tired of having to sift through hundreds of "IRC got xxx" messages while I was trying to debug some other changes I was making. Plus I was concerned about the size of the debug.log file - after running for only 12 hours, the file was hundreds of megabytes.
